channel.title: HTML on Gavin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in HTML on Gavin's Blog

item.title: HTML Basic
item.description: Tag <!DOCTYPE html> <html></html> <head><head> 通常是放title、meta、link、script、style的地方 <link> refer to an external CSS file <title></title> 网页的标题 <body></body> 网页的主体 <h1></h1> 标题h1-h6 <p><\p> 段落 <hr> 分割线 <br> line break <pre></pre> 这个会将里面的内容输出，空格换行等都能被显示(pre-formatted text) <div></div> container for element <span> container for text <iframe> display a web page within a web page Attr Some suggestions you should know: HTML5 does not require lowercase attribute name, but everybody should use lowercase in HTML HTML5 does not require quotes around attribute values, but everybody should quote attribute values
